title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       Park Superintendent: Amy Bracewell Acting Administrative Officer: Jeff Winters Chief Ranger: Dave LaMere Protection Rangers: Tim Whelan, Sean Kelly, Matthew Collins Resource Manager/Biologist: Chris Martin Biological Technician: Linda White Curator: Christine Valosin Facility Manager: Jason Huart Maintenance Chief: Jeff Wells Program Assistant: Rose Dickinson Maintenance Crew: Cindy Vanderwerker, Eric Dalzell, Dan Tibbitts, Rob Bennett, Tony Barber (seasonal), Rob Santspree (seasonal), Mark Neaton (seasonal) Bill Mound (seasonal), Rod Fraser (seasonal) Acting Chief of Interpretation: Eric Schnitzer Interpretive Rangers: Joe Craig, Bill Valosin, Megan Stevens, Tom Nordby (seasonal), Roger Farrell (seasonal), Suzanne Reynolds-Brady (seasonal), Dougie Bicket (seasonal)
